Some exciting personal and professional news! Most of you know that I’ve been looking for a partner to help me scale Reonomy into a company of consequence for over 8 years now. When I managed to convince Bill Okun to step into the business full-time after two years on our Board, I hoped that he would be the partner that I’ve been looking for. Over the last few quarters, that hope has been replaced by absolute conviction and certainty that Bill is the right partner to help us on the amazing journey that we are on at Reonomy.That’s why I am thrilled to announce that I am stepping up to a new full-time role as Executive Chairman, with Bill assuming the role of CEO. I’ve known Bill for almost 7 years (thanks for the intro Brooks Gibbins and Gareth Jones!) and I know that he will do a fantastic job focusing on daily execution and management of the team while I focus on our clients, strategy and partnerships.Thanks Bill and look forward to all that we’ll accomplish together!Come join us!  :)
